Package com.impetus.pizzaonline.dao

Class Summary
ItemDAO This class is used for all the items related transactrions in the database.The tables used here are the item table and the toppings table.The transactions include fetching,inseting and updating.
ItemDAOTest  
OfferDAO this class does all the offer transactions to and from the data base for the offer table through the offer class.
OfferDAOTest  
OrderDAO this class deals with the all transactions related to the order table using the order class
OrderDAOTest  
UserDAO This DAO class is used for all the user table transactions(here there are two user tables,Customer and Staff) at the database such as fetching,inserting and updating.
UserDAOTest
